title: K-Lite Codec Pack 11.7.0 Mega_Standard + 11.7.3 Update Seven7i
description:
Seven7i Presents

K-Lite Codec Pack 11.7.0 / 11.7.3 Update Mega_Full_Standard_Basic 

November 27 2015

K-Lite Codec Pack FullK-Lite Codec Pack: 
is a collection of components needed for audio and video 
playback in DirectShow players such as Windows Media Player, 
Media Center, and Media Player Classic. It contains everything 
you need to play all common audio and video file formats. 
It also provides additional functionality such a thumbnail 
generation in Explorer. The pack has a very advanced 
installer which is highly flexible and has unique problem solving capabilities. 

Changes in 11.7.3 Update:
Media Player Classic Home Cinema [version 1.7.10.17]
LAV Filters [version 0.67-3-g89632]
madVR [version 0.89.17]
Codec Tweak Tool [version 6.0.3]

Note:
Copying and uploading this torrent is not allow for it is a
Seven7i release. Permission must be obtained or else they
will be reported to a Super Moderator.

Enjoy,
Seven7i :)
